name: Beach Rules
description: Beach Rules will test your memory, visual agility and reflex through various tests. Keep the beach in order and compete in different events and mini-games!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: Any
